item.title: SaF IT Services
item.description: SaF IT Services web site A little bit over a year ago I founded, together with Fritz and Stefy our company, SaF IT Services. The web site is hosted by Easyhost Belgium and is an extremely simple one, it is based on: HTML CSS Bootstrap JS I have used a free bootstrap template called Freelancer to implement the site, for which the important parameters were : Speed Look (should not be too bad as I am not a designer but I can spot something ugly) Content The site could be further optimized by slimming down the various js files that it imports and of which only a minimal part are used.
